subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Clips from a Famous Illinois Haunted Location
author: Lisby
full_text:
Very interesting stuff, Juli. :)

Ann

On Jan 31, 2008, at 6:38 PM, juli velazquez wrote:

>
> Over last weekend the owner of a famous Illinois haunted location  
> (the release of the movie is not due out until later this year).   
> The owner requested that my organization bring the box to the  
> house.  So upon this request, myself, Joel, Jeff and Nancy brought  
> several of the boxes to help assist the owner in some unanswered  
> historical questions.  This session was amazing!  Although I can  
> not disclosure the name of the location our little session may just  
> be the exposure that the other side wants.  We will be turning our  
> findings over to the owner and production company, and who knows,  
> the box just may make its debut on the big screen.
>
> I would love your input on the attached files before I send them  
> on.  I have many and have additional sessions still left to review.
>
> I thank you all in advance for you help and assistance!
>
> Juli
>
>
>
>
> The contents of this eletronic correspondence is private &  
> confidential and meant only for the party and/or parties it is  
> addressed to.
>
> No part of this email transmission may be publicly posted or  
> forwarded to other parties without explicit written permission.
>
>  <10, can you confirm the child was ten.mp3><Do we need  
> to cross some of the entities over, yes,  
> rested.mp3><grounded.mp3><is that why he can't cross over,  
> RIGHT.mp3><Tom, There is one.mp3>
